title: Welcome to the New Updates Page!
body: This page now helps you keep your extension up-to-date by checking for the latest releases directly from our GitHub repository. We've also added this notification system for important announcements.

title: About Notifications
body:
We may occasionally send important announcements or tips via this notification system. Click the bell icon to see new messages. Click on a message title to read the full details.

Notifications are cached locally for faster loading.

title: Tip: Manual Installation
body: If you download a .zip or .crx file, you might need to manually install it. Go to chrome://extensions, enable Developer mode, and drag the downloaded file onto the page.
